conclusion: Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses award - Convention proceedings
docname: CASE OF ECKLE v. GERMANY - [Slovenian Translation]
scl: De Wilde, Ooms and Versyp judgment of 10 March 1972, Series A no. 14, pp. 8-9, 10, paras. 16, 20;König judgment of 10 March 1980, Series A no. 36, pp. 14-15, 18, paras. 15, 23;Corigliano judgment of 10 December 1982, Series A no. 57, p. 17, para. 53;Sunday Times judgment of 6 November 1980, Series A no. 38, pp. 16-17, paras. 37, 41;Le Compte, van Leuven and de Meyere judgment of 18 October 1982, Series A no. 54, p. 10, para. 21
